description: This is an HTML file that implements the user interface for a database visualizer web application. It includes layout, styling, and client-side scripting to browse databases, tables, and display table data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing database entries and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates the HTML structure for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell based on data type and content size.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
